author: Anya Zoledziowski, Natasha Grzincic
title: Coronavirus Updates Canada: Justin Trudeau Scolds Canadians to 'Stay Home'
description: Ontario to close all non-essential businesses on Tuesday, Ottawa may bring in fines and jail time after Vancouver residents partied and flocked to beaches over the weekend.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Canada.
Updated at 1:45 (EDT): Premier Doug Ford has ordered the closure of all non-essential businesses in the province, effective Tuesday night, shortly after Prime Minister Justin Trudeau voiced disappointment in C… [+7582 chars]
